item.title: Former #Jharkhand CM #ChampaiSoren resigned from the #JMM sa

item.description: #WATCH | #DDA asking for permission to cut #trees that had already been cut. 1100 trees cut on #DelhiLG's orders: AAP minister #SaurabhBhardwaj #Delhi #BJP #AamAadmiParty #VKSaxena
